item.title: Load Only the Projects You Need with Solution Filters
item.description: You, like many other developers, may work in very large codebases that contain hundreds or thousands of projects in a single Visual Studio solution. Our Visual Studio team has seen multiple approaches that developers use to only load and work in the projects that they need.
